Description: Body sherd of Attic red-figured pottery cup; interior: painted lozenge pattern with dilute brown diamonds on reserved lozenges and added red diamonds on black lozenges; exterior glazed black.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (E134.7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0710) (Phase 1)
